summary: Completed comprehensive testing of F.A.R.H.A AI assistant - backend APIs, frontend UI, Google OAuth integration, and voice features. Most functionality working correctly with minor backend issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of 400 for invalid session ID

infrastructure_notes.issue: No CORS headers found in OPTIONS request
infrastructure_notes.impact: May cause frontend issues if not handled at infrastructure level

passed_tests: All authentication-protected endpoints return 401 when not authenticated
F.A.R.H.A logo and branding display correctly
AI face visualization with animated eyes working
Voice recognition browser APIs available (webkitSpeechRecognition, speechSynthesis)
Responsive design works on tablet view
No JavaScript errors on page load
Chat interface properly hidden when not authenticated
action_item_for_E1: Minor backend improvements: Fix session auth error handling to return 400 instead of 500 for invalid session IDs. CORS configuration appears to be handled at infrastructure level and is working correctly.
